original_title: Béla Fleck & the Flecktones: Live at the Quick
overview: Fronted by one of the most accomplished banjo players of his time, Bela Fleck and the Flecktones are captured live in concert on Live at the Quick. The versatile band performs just over a dozen songs including such radically different compositions as "Amazing Grace," "Big Country," "Hoedown," and the prelude from a Bach violin concerto.

production_companies.name: Sony Music Entertainment Visual Works Inc.

title: Béla Fleck & the Flecktones: Live at the Quick
